Desc.entry: A small grants scheme run by South Yorkshire Police Authority, in partnership with South Yorkshire Police. The ABC Awards are designed to help local community and voluntary groups which address the aim of the fund. The aim of the fund changes each year, the aim 2010/11 is to contribute to improving confidence and satisfaction with South Yorkshire Police via diversity activities for young people in their own community.Groups can apply for up to Â£2000 of funding. Grants are awarded on an annual basis and applications are available around March/April each year. For specific details please visit the website.
